thig5.1:0.3: Verses of a Certain Unknown Elder
thig5.1:1.3: I had not experienced serenity of mind,
thig5.1:1.4: not even for a split second.
thig5.1:2.1: I had not attained peace of mind,
thig5.1:2.3: and with my arms in the air, crying aloud,
thig5.1:3.4: the aggregates, elements, and sense domains.
thig5.1:4.2: I sat down on one side.
thig5.1:4.4: I have purified my divine eye.
thig5.1:5.1: I am able to read the minds of others,
thig5.1:5.2: and I have purified the ear element.
thig5.1:5.4: and reached the destruction of the influences.
thig5.1:5.5: I have realized the six special knowledges,
thig5.1:5.6: and completed the teaching of the Buddha.”
